strings.Value: "Your Sarenrae is a real hypocrite! Forgive this one, punish that one... Calistria's teachings are simple and fair: you get offended â€“ you get revenge! It's all honest, no tricks or pretense!"

"The debate between mercy and revenge has gone on for thousands of years. Do you really think you and I are going to settle it now? You and your goddess have chosen your path. I follow my goddess a different way."
